targets.expr: 1 - ((station_mem_free{customer=~"$customer", station=~"$station", host=~"$host"} + station_mem_cached{customer=~"$customer", station=~"$station", host=~"$host"}) / station_mem_total{customer=~"$customer", station=~"$station", host=~"$host"})

((gpu_memory{customer=~"$customer", station=~"$station", host=~"$host"} - gpu_mem_free{customer=~"$customer", station=~"$station", host=~"$host"}) / gpu_memory{customer=~"$customer", station=~"$station", host=~"$host"}) > 0

1 - ((station_mem_free{customer=~"$customer", station=~"$station", host=~"$host"} + station_mem_cached{customer=~"$customer", station=~"$station", host=~"$host"}) / station_mem_total{customer=~"$customer", station=~"$station", host=~"$host"})
